events.name: Huge Luminous Bar of Light Captured on Video Over Spokane Valley, Washington
events.description: A witness in Spokane Valley described a large, luminous object that appeared to fly directly over their location, according to the account. The object was approximately 10-15 feet in diameter and had an intense, pulsating glow. While the witness's testimony is compelling, it remains unexplained, with no apparent physical evidence or further details provided.
